title: Grab this gigantic, 1600W 80+ Platinum power supply for just 33 cents per watt Seasonic's Prime TX 1600W is down to just $532
summary: The Seasonic Prime TX-1600 is a high-end power supply with native PCIe 5.0 and ATX 3.1 compatibility, fully modular design, and 80+ Platinum efficiency.
insight: High-quality power supply for demanding high-end builds at an affordable price.

title: OpenClaw-fueled ordering frenzy creates Apple Mac shortage delivery for high Unified Memory units now ranges from 6 days to 6 weeks
summary: Apple Mac shortages are caused by high demand for Unified Memory units, leading to order lead times of 6 weeks. This demand surge is driven by the device's suitability for locally run agentic AI. The shortage affects high-memory models in particular.
insight: Unified Memory architecture fuels AI demand, exacerbating Mac shortages.

title: xSDR A tiny M.2 2230 SDR module with Artix-7 FPGA and LMS7002M RFIC (Crowdfunding)
summary: Wavelet Lab's xSDR is a tiny M.2 2230 SDR module with 2x2 MIMO support, featuring a Lime Microsystems LMS7002M RFIC and an AMD Artix-7 FPGA, suitable for cellular research, spectrum analysis, and satellite tracking.
insight: High-performance SDR in a compact M.2 2230 format.

title: LR2021 LoRa Plus board combines Semtech LR2021 and Nordic nRF54L15 for high-speed FLRC and LoRa connectivity
summary: The LR2021 LoRa Plus board combines Semtech's LR2021 and Nordic's nRF54L15 for high-speed connectivity. It supports long-range LoRa and FLRC applications up to 2.6 Mbps. The board offers multi-protocol capabilities and expansion options.
insight: Enabling high-speed LoRa connectivity for IoT and industrial applications
